name: Karin Olivares
coverLetter: Hello my name is Karin Olivares I am a college student with intensive experience in the trimming world. I have down 2 seasons in northern california one in humboldt county in garberville and another in Mendocino county. I have also worked at various shops in Los Angeles county including Southern California Collective and Foothill Wellness Collective in the San Fernando Valley. I can trim anywhere from 1 1/2 - 2 pounds a day depending on the quality of the bud and i can adapt to any trimming style the growers like whether that be a tight trim or a fluffier more leafy trim. I am extremely reliable and have my own car to get me to any location on time daily.
contact: My phone number is (626) 644-0377 email: gizmocles@gmail.com
